mods.abstract: WSM program aimed at George Rosen of Variety magazine to celebrate winning the 1948 Variety Award for 'How To Run A Radio Station'. Part two of four, this part concludes the section on vocalists as well as covering WSM's children's programming and public service programs. This disc is a duplicate of TR001246_2.

subject.topic: Woman looks at the news (Radio program)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
